snippet: Almost a year after the disappearance of 29-year-old Avera Mengistu, his family remains mostly in the dark about his whereabouts or condition.
abstract: Family of Avera Mengistu, Israeli Jew of Ethiopian descent, continues earnest search for answers with regards to his mysterious disappearance after he crossed border into Gaza; Israel authorities remain circumspect in offering clues but say they believe Mengistu was abducted by Hamas militants and is being held hostage.

byline.contributor: Majd Al Waheidi contributed reporting from Gaza City.

lead_paragraph: Almost a year after the disappearance of 29-year-old Avera Mengistu, his family remains mostly in the dark about his whereabouts or condition.

headline.main: Ambiguity Shrouds the Case of a Missing Israeli of Ethiopian Descent
headline.print_headline: Ambiguity Shrouds the Case of a Missing Israeli of Ethiopian Descent
